Budget Breakdown (Estimates):
Flights: $600 (round trip per person) x 2 = $1200
Accommodations: Manhattan ($790 x 2 nights) + White Plains ($708 x 2 nights) + Syracuse ($1031 x 2 nights) = $3518
Dining: $50 (average per meal for 2) x 3 meals x 6 days = $900
Attractions: $100 (average per attraction for 2) x 6 days = $600
Transportation (Rental Car & Gas): $200 (Manhattan to White Plains) + $300 (White Plains to Syracuse) = $500

Total Estimated Cost: $1200 (flights) + $3518 (accommodations) + $900 (dining) + $600 (attractions) + $500 (transportation) = $6718

Note: The budget exceeds the provided limit of $3,800. To fit the budget, consider reducing the number of attractions visited, choosing less expensive dining options, or finding more affordable accommodations.
